title: Dolmathes
text: grape leaves stuffed with rice, dill & mint.

title: Feta sto Fourno
text: Greek feta baked with tomato, capers & Metaxa brandy.

title: Bizelosalata
text: Sweet green peas & feta with scallions & dill.

title: Gigantes
text: Oven-baked giant beans withtomato sauce, olive oil & herbed feta.

title: Souvla Tis Emeras
text: Seasonal roasted potatoes with oregano, lemon and olive oil.

title: Sto withtomato
text: Olive oil & herbed feta freshly-baked savouries beat anything out of a packet.
